item.title: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear teases 2028 Democratic White House bid ahead of South Carolina visit

item.title: From tariffs to universities, Trump's negotiating style is often less dealmaking and more coercion
item.description: President Donald Trump prides himself on being a dealmaker, but his negotiating style is more ultimatum than compromise.
